Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24

Package view.CLI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputExecutor
    This is the interface that defines every class that represent a different phase of the game
    InputProcessor
    This interface accomunates every screen that interacts with an InputListener
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLIBoardScreen
    This class represents the Screen that is shown during form the moment the game starts to the moment of its end
    CLIConnectionErrorScreen
    This class represents the screen that is shown when a connection error eccurs
    CLIConnectionScreen
    This class represents the screen that is shown when the player chooses to start the game
    CLIGodSelectionScreen
    This class represents the screen that is shown when the game is at the GodSelection Phase It prints the list of gods and allows the player to either choose which god to select or just read at their description
    CLIMenuScreen
    The screen that shows up at the start of the application
    CLIPickGodScreen
    This class represents the screen that is shown when the game is at the GodPicking phase Here the players can, one by one, pick the gods from a pool previously selected
    CLIScreenFactory
    This is the ScreenFactory of the CLI.
    CLIWinnerScreen
    This class represents the screen that is shown when a player wins the game It is responsible for writing the Winning Message and it allows the player to choose what to oo next
    Colors
    This class contains the list of all colors used in the game all the colors are 8-bit colors, and each of them is represented using the corresponding escape code
    DrawElements
    This class contains all the methods responsible for the aesthetic of the game and its appearance
    InputListener
    This class represent the thread that listens to stdin and delivers the input to the current screen
